Interface QueryExecutorInterface

All Superinterfaces:
LoggingInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryExecutor
public interface QueryExecutorInterface extends LoggingInterface
Doing the dirty job of connecting through database drivers and processing the ResultSet into maintainable QueryResultInterface.
See Also:
  • loadProviders(List)
  • execute(List)
  • ConnectionPoolInterface
